snippet: England maintained its perfect record in qualifying for the 2016 European Championship with a 2-0 home win over Switzerland.
abstract: English forward Wayne Rooney scores his 50th international goal, breaking team's scoring record and helping team maintain its perfect record in qualifying for 2016 European Championship with 2-0 victory over Switzerland; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: England maintained its perfect record in qualifying for the 2016 European Championship with a 2-0 home win over Switzerland.

headline.main: Wayne Rooney Sets English Scoring Record
